DOC.brief_summary: This randomize prospective clinical trial design determine wound complication rate stainless steel staple versus subcuticular suture skin closure obese parturient ( BMI≥ 30kg/m2 ) undergo cesarean delivery .
DOC.brief_title: Sutures vs . Staples Skin Closure After C-section Obese Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 18 year old BMI ≥ 30kg/m2 admission labor delivery Patient schedule cesarean delivery nonemergent labor indication cesarean delivery Singleton pregnancies Gestational age ≥ 24weeks Cesarean delivery perform regional anesthesia Exclusion criterion : Refusal participate BMI < 30kg/m2 < 24 week gestation Intrauterine fetal demise Chronic pain syndrome require chronic narcotic use Emergent clinical situation preclude obtain inform consent
